pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Storage-pyPython Client library to interact with Supabase Storage.## How to useAs it takes some effort to get the headers. We suggest that you use the storage functionality through the main [Supabase Python Client](https://github.com/supabase-community/supabase-py)```python3from storage3 import create_clienturl = "https://<your_supabase_id>.supabase.co/storage/v1"key = "<your api key>"headers = {"apiKey": key, "Authorization": f"Bearer {key}"}# pass in is_async=True to create an async clientstorage_client = create_client(url, headers, is_async=False)storage_client.list_buckets()```
